long_description: The REI Double Cable Lock reduces break-ins by securing the luggage handle to locking zipper sliders via the double cables. Cable lock also lets you secure luggage to a fixed object. TSA-approved lock lets inspectors access luggage without destroying locks. 3-dial combination can be reset as needed. Short cable can be used alone as a small cable lock. Lock other items to your luggage with the cable. REI Double Cable Lock is constructed of durable cast zinc alloy, ABS plastic and braided steel.
short_description: The REI Double Cable Lock reduces break-ins by securing the luggage handle to locking zipper sliders via the double cables. Cable lock also lets you secure luggage to a fixed object.
